original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2276)@</color>8把飛劍，追蹤攻擊隨機敵武將，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2276)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Reply time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2276)@</color>8 flying swords, tracking and attacking random enemy generals, with <color=#ccffcc>$ Skill_Str(2276)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage to the enemy.
